snippet.title: Draw a Stickman: EPIC 2: Preview
snippet.description: Grab your pencil and get ready for the most creative DRAW A STICKMAN adventure yet!!  Create your own original stickman and then watch it come to life in DRAW A STICKMAN: EPIC 2!  Imagination is the key, as you enter a storybook full of mystery and wonder, unusual creatures, and enigmatic puzzles!  Challenge yourself to unlock every secret, collect every drawing, and share your creativity with the world!
